cds::memory::michael::opt::page_heap< HEAP > Struct Template Reference

Option setter specifies page heap. More...

#include <cds/memory/michael/options.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename HEAP>
struct cds::memory::michael::opt::page_heap< HEAP >

Option setter specifies page heap.

This heap is used by Michael's allocator for superblock allocation. The size of superblock is:

  • 64K - for small blocks
  • 1M - for other blocks

Available HEAP implementations:

  • page_allocator
  • page_cached_allocator
